title: The Changed

Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: First real connection with others, disturbing sense of belonging
knowledge: There are at least 43 Changed individuals
The Change has distinct stages of progression
Signal is still broadcasting, creating more Changed
transformation_markers: Can see geometric forms in empty space
Feeling belonging for first time in his life

Sera_Volkov.emotional_state: Eerily calm, emotionally distant, intellectually curious
Sera_Volkov.role: Mentor to Adrian, documenting transformation stages

Dr_Marie_Okonkwo.emotional_state: Professional concern, sees Changed as patients needing cure

new_characters_introduced.name: Marcus Osei
new_characters_introduced.note: Can make geometric forms visible in air

new_characters_introduced.name: Patel
new_characters_introduced.role: Young Changed with purple hair, Stage 2

planted_elements.element: Sera's search for meaning in transformation
planted_elements.planted_for: Chapter 60 - she finds meaning in complete transcendence

planted_elements.element: Suicide among Changed who can't handle transformation

themes_touched: Belonging vs humanity - connection at cost of human identity
Terror of transcendence - transformation as evolution or disease
Inevitability - signal still broadcasting, more will change
atmosphere: Unsettling recognition, community in wrongness, clinical capture
key_images: Basement covered in unified mathematical proof
Five people arranged in perfect pentagon
Geometric forms visible in empty air
foreshadowing: Government response escalating to seeing Changed as threats
